mapper.insert: insert into hotel(hnum, hname, hphone, hemail, hzipcode, haddress1, haddress2, hfname, hinfo, hcheckin, hcheckout, hstar) values(seq_hnum.nextval, #{hname}, #{hphone}, #{hemail}, #{hzipcode}, #{haddress1}, #{haddress2}, #{hfname}, #{hinfo}, #{hcheckin}, #{hcheckout}, #{hstar})
mapper.select: select hnum, hname, hphone, hemail, hzipcode, haddress1, haddress2, hfname, hinfo from hotel where hnum = #{hnum}
mapper.update: update hotel set hphone = #{hphone}, hemail = #{hemail}, hzipcode = #{hzipcode}, haddress1 = #{haddress1}, haddress2 = #{haddress2}, hfname = #{hfname}, hinfo = #{hinfo}, hcheckin = #{hcheckin}, hcheckout = #{hcheckout} where hnum = #{hnum}
mapper.select:
select count(*) cnt from hotel
